name: APIs and operations
description: Model your API surface in APIM and decide how it is onboarded and versioned.
topics: Import from OpenAPI where possible to reduce drift between gateway config and API spec.
Decide API versioning approach (path, header, or query) and how products map to versions.
Standardize backend addressing and use policies for routing and transformation when needed.
nextSteps: Define an OpenAPI-first workflow and publish artifacts through CI/CD.
Decide where policies are applied: global, product, API, or operation scope.
